---
title: "Correlation Matrix"
output: html_document
date: "2023-04-13"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(corrplot)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
minn_use <- subset(minn_acs_data, select = c(med_hh_income, total_female, total_male, total_foodstamp, total_pop, total_labor_force, 
                                 perc_unemployed, perc_ba_plus, total_educ, herfendahl))

minn_use.cor <- cor(minn_use)
minn_use.cor
corrplot(minn_use.cor)
#NAs in med_hh_income, perc_unemployed, perc_ba_plus, herfendahl

minn_no_na <- na.omit(minn_use)
minn_no_na.cor <- cor(minn_no_na)
cor(minn_no_na)
corrplot(cor(minn_no_na))
corrplot(cor(minn_no_na), type = "lower", addCoef.col = "black", method = "color", diag = FALSE, number.cex = 0.7)

palette <- colorRampPalette(c("red", "white", "blue")) (20)
heatmap(x = minn_no_na.cor, col = palette, symm = TRUE)
```
